line.comment: * If we want to fly to a moving target, we must update $sector.
* If the target doesn't exist *anymore*, we abort the move.
* Try to follow a safe path.
* Docking procedure is managed by another script.
* Reevaluate the possibility of joining $target through jump beacons. We just return null if such a path exists because the ship will restart !move.jump on its own.
* We follow the next gate on route to be able to use a follow command with timeout, letting [THIS] aware of the target in "real time".

sval.val: If we want to fly to a moving target, we must update $sector.
If the target doesn't exist *anymore*, we abort the move.
Try to follow a safe path.
Docking procedure is managed by another script.
Reevaluate the possibility of joining $target through jump beacons. We just return null if such a path exists because the ship will restart !move.jump on its own.
We follow the next gate on route to be able to use a follow command with timeout, letting [THIS] aware of the target in "real time".
